affirmation: Wonderful things are going to happen to me. Anything is possible
Today I am going to shine. My possibilities are endless.
My imperfections make me human. I forgive myself when I make a mistake.
I attract the perfect people at the right time. I trust that what is right for me won't pass me by.

title: Challenges & Success
affirmation: My ability to navigate challenges is limitless. My potential to succeed is infinite.

title: Prosperity
affirmation: My thoughts are filled with positivity and my life is plentiful with prosperity.

title: Self-worth
affirmation: I acknowledge my own self-worth. My confidence is soaring.

title: Heart & Mind
affirmation: I have strength in my heart and clarity in my mind.

title: Unstoppable
affirmation: I have the power to create change. I am unstoppable.

title: Letting Go
affirmation: I have everything I need. I let go of all that no longer serves me.

title: I Deserve the Best
affirmation: I deserve the best. I deserve love, compassion and kindness.

title: Intuition
affirmation: I listen to my intuition and trust my inner guide. I trust myself to make the right decision.

title: Space to Grow
affirmation: I give myself space to grow and learn. If I fall, I will get back up again.

title: I am Enough
affirmation: I allow myself to be who I am without judgment. I am enough. I am whole.

title: Accepting Emotions
affirmation: I accept my emotions and let them serve their purpose.

title: Care & Attention
affirmation: I give myself the care and attention that I deserve.

title: Right Direction
affirmation: I am always headed in the right direction. I trust that I am on the right path.

title: My Place in the World
affirmation: I make a difference in the world by simply existing in it.

title: Stand Up
affirmation: I choose to focus on what I can change. I stand up for what I believe in.

title: Change is Good
affirmation: I can choose excitement over nervousness. Change is good.

title: Internal Resources
affirmation: I have all the internal resources I need to thrive.

title: Love & Acceptance
affirmation: I am filled with love and acceptance for myself and others.

title: Joy
affirmation: I choose to find the joy in my life. I move forward with an open mind and heart.

title: Incredible Person
affirmation: I believe I am an incredible person. Inside and out.

title: Confidence
affirmation: I am becoming more confident and can choose to feel differently at any given moment.
I focus on each day, one hour at a time, one thing at a time.
Everyone’s path is uniquely beautiful, including my own.
I am capable of so much. I am proud of myself.
My confidence grows when I step outside of my comfort zone.
It is enough to do my best. It’s okay to make mistakes.
No matter how hard it is, I can do it. I have inner strength.
